entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being drenched and sputtering after a water-filled balloon exploded on his head. (Excerpt: 'A large, red, water-filled balloon had dropped from out of the ceiling onto Ron’s head and ex ploded.')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being hit by a second water bomb that burst at his feet. (Excerpt: 'just as a second water bomb dropped — narrowly missing Hermione, it burst at Harry’s feet...')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being narrowly missed by the second water bomb. (Excerpt: 'just as a second water bomb dropped — narrowly missing Hermione, it burst at Harry’s feet...')

entities.name: peevs
entities.description: Peeves is described as a Poltergeist who is taking aim with a water-filled balloon. (Excerpt: 'floating twenty feet above them, Peeves the Poltergeist, a little man in a bell-covered hat and orange bow tie...')

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as rushing to the scene to stop Peeves. (Excerpt: '“PEEVES!” yelled an angry voice. “Peeves, come down here at ONCE!”')

entities.name: gryffindor house
entities.description: Gryffindor House is mentioned as the house that Professor McGonagall is head of. (Excerpt: 'Professor McGonagall, Deputy Headmistress and head of Gryffindor House...')
